title: 1.2.5索引贴的暮色森林mod打上去崩溃问题求助
author: 亟兮
txt_content:
4 mods loaded
Minecraft Forge 3.2.4.114
FML v2.1.28.95
Forge Mod Loader version 2.1.28.95 for Minecraft 1.2.5
mod_ModLoaderMp : Pre-initialized (minecraft.jar)
mod_MinecraftForge : Pre-initialized (minecraft.jar)
mod_ReiMinimap : Pre-initialized ([1.2.4&1.25]ReiMinimap_v3.0_04汉化版by大刘.zip)
mod_TwilightForest : Loaded (twilightforest-1.8.0.zip) 
Minecraft has crashed! 
---------------------- Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem. 
--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 5b4b8294 --------
Generated 12-6-27 下午5:44 Minecraft: Minecraft 1.2.5
OS: Windows 7 (amd64) version 6.1
Java: 1.7.0_06-ea, Oracle Corporation
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
LWJGL: 2.4.2
OpenGL: Intel(R) HD Graphics Family version 3.0.0 - Build 8.15.10.2266, Intel cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.IllegalAccessException: Class cpw.mods.fml.common.modloader.ModLoaderModContainer can not access a member of class mod_TwilightForest with modifiers ""
at cpw.mods.fml.common.modloader.ModLoaderModContainer.preInit(ModLoaderModContainer.java:109)
at cpw.mods.fml.common.Loader.preModInit(Loader.java:233)
at cpw.mods.fml.common.Loader.loadMods(Loader.java:578)
at cpw.mods.fml.client.FMLClientHandler.onPreLoad(FMLClientHandler.java:183)
at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.a(Minecraft.java:383)
at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:735)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalAccessException: Class cpw.mods.fml.common.modloader.ModLoaderModContainer can not access a member of class mod_TwilightForest with modifiers ""
at sun.reflect.Reflection.ensureMemberAccess(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Class.newInstance0(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Class.newInstance(Unknown Source)
at cpw.mods.fml.common.modloader.ModLoaderModContainer.preInit(ModLoaderModContainer.java:105)
... 6 more
--- END ERROR REPORT 92930d73 ----------
以上错误代码 这是怎么了啊 我就打了 这几个
都是索引贴给的基础必备mod啊 暮色森林也是把下载包zip直接扔到.minecraft/mods里面的啊 大神求助

replies.author: 亟兮
replies.txt_content: 大神们啊 都不在么 困扰我一天了啊

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content: 你发了多少个帖子啊。。。在此再次注明，请升级twilightforest-1.10.0.zip
